```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(cd2030.pooled)
library(dplyr)

cache <- params$cache
national_estimates <- cache$national_estimates
```

## Overall National Coverage Estimates

### Measles 1 Coverage

```{r}
coverage_data <- process_coverage_data(.data = national_estimates, indicator = 'cov_measles1_penta1')
plot(coverage_data)
```
